---
title: "Left APOE4 Disaggregated by Sex"
author: "Anna MacFarlane"
date: "3/21/2021"
output: pdf_document
---
```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
new <- read.csv("propGeno4Left.csv")
apoe4 <- new %>% 
  filter(! is.na(Genotype)) %>% 
  filter(Genotype != "") %>% 
  filter(Genotype != "HN") %>% 
  mutate(geno = case_when(
    Genotype == "apoe4" | Genotype == "apoe42" ~ "apoe4",
    Genotype == "APOE3" | Genotype == "APOE33" ~ "APOE3",
    Genotype == "APOE4" | Genotype == "APOE44" ~ "APOE4",
    Genotype == "CVN" ~ "CVN"
  )) %>% 
  filter(geno == "APOE4") %>% 
  group_by(geno) %>% 
  group_by(Sex)
```

```{r Iped, echo = FALSE}
ggplot(data = apoe4, aes(factor(Sex), Iped)) +
  geom_violin() +
  geom_boxplot(width = 0.1, outlier.color = "red") +
  geom_jitter(height = 0, width = 0.3) +
  labs(x = "Sex",
   	y = "",
   	title = "Interpeduncular Nucleus: apoe4",
   	subtitle = "Red points denoting outliers")
 
res.aov <- aov(Iped ~ geno, data = apoe4)
summary(res.aov)
```
